bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
There's a typo in the pcp-selinux postinstall script:
Installing : pcp-selinux-3.11.8-1.fc25.x86_64 538/1497 libsemanage.map_file: Unable to open %{localstatedir}/lib/pcp/selinux/pcpupstream.pp (No such file or directory). libsemanage.semanage_direct_install_file: Unable to read file %{localstatedir}/lib/pcp/selinux/pcpupstream.pp (No such file or directory). semodule: Failed on %{localstatedir}/lib/pcp/selinux/pcpupstream.pp! warning: %post(pcp-selinux-3.11.8-1.fc25.x86_64) scriptlet failed, exit status 1 Non-fatal POSTIN scriptlet failure in rpm package pcp-selinux Non-fatal POSTIN scriptlet failure in rpm package pcp-selinux
[david@localhost ~]$ rpm -q --scripts pcp-selinux postinstall scriptlet (using /bin/sh): semodule -X 400 -i %{localstatedir}/lib/pcp/selinux/pcpupstream.pp
Do note the macro has not expanded...
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): pcp-selinux-3.11.8-1.fc25.x86_64
